mapper.insert: insert into org(orgid, orgpw, orgname, orgcategory, logo, orgphone, ceoname, orgzipcode, orgaddr, orgaddrdetail, orgaddretc, orgunqnum) values(#{orgid},#{orgpw},#{orgname}, #{orgcategory}, #{logo},#{orgphone},#{ceoname}, #{orgzipcode},#{orgaddr},#{orgaddrdetail},#{orgaddretc},#{orgunqnum})
mapper.select: select orgname from org where orgid=#{orgid}
select orgname from org where orgcategory=#{orgcategory};
select orgcategory from org where orgid=#{orgid}
select orgid from org where orgname=#{orgname}
select orgname from org where orgid=#{connectionid}
select count(*) > 0 from org where orgunqnum=#{orgunqnum}
